data.title: Annie Award Voting Reference Guide
data.meta_description: Reference links to help ASIFA voters make more informed decisions
data.text:
As a way of helping ASIFA members make more informed decisions for this year's Annie Awards, AWN has created this reference and resource list for all the nominated properties. Where information was available, we have linked to official websites, including trailers, clips and pictures. We've also linked to any feature articles we've written within Animation World Magazine or VFXWorld.

Below is a list of the nominees in alphabetical order, followed by the category they are nominated in and links to further information. If you have any links that you feel should be added, please send them right away to editor@awn.com.

In addition, if you've seen any of these nominated works and have comments, feel free to submit them using the "Post A Comment" link at the bottom of the page.
